website_summaries.verdict: Choose this rug if your priorities  are thickness and softness. However, it's somewhat lacking when it comes to being absorbent and staying in place.
pros: In addition to its plushy, shaggy microfibers, this bathroom rug has a layer of embedded memory foam that makes it extremely comfortable to stand on
Holds up well to multiple washings
cons: Backing is stiff and doesn't stay put on all types of flooring
Not as water-absorbing as some competitors

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! I washed this on gentle cycle before even using it once and the fuzzy portion tore apart from it's base on both sides during the very first wash.
customer_reviews.author: JeanMank

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after one wash
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bath mat when it first arrived. Sadly, after only washing it once, the whole thing fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Barrett

customer_reviews.title: I liked it until I washed it and now it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it until I washed it and now it looks like a hot mess - it's basically falling apart at this point.
customer_reviews.author: JulieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mat!
customer_reviews.text: Why aren't all floors made with this material?! This bath rug is incredibly soft and supportive. The rubberized grip on the backing keeps it in place nicely. The grey color has undertones that might seem a bit purple if placed on blue flooring. However, I'm quite happy with it, whatever the undertones!
customer_reviews.author: mewell

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a cloud.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bathmat I’ve ever put my feet on, ever. I could curl up and sleep on it, it’s sooo soft & cushy. I got it in white though and I have zero idea how to clean it. Wish they had more colors & sizes, would love an area rug of this material. Also, it’s like 2 inches thick, so if you’re planning to put it in a spot where a door needs to swing over it, it’s highly unlikely that that will be possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ange La

customer_reviews.title: Not very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: This is a delightfully cushy, soft bathmat that looks great, but there are two issues: one, it is not particularly absorbent, so I have to wipe my feet across it several times before I feel like I can walk on our hardwood floors in the master bedroom; and two, the backing is stiff as a board, so it's very hard to hang over the edge of the shower/tub (which we do so as to avoid the cats deciding it's better than a litter box). If you want a bathroom mat more for looks than function, this is definitely for you, but if you need one that actually works, I'd give it a hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: foodblogger521

customer_reviews.title: The mat looked nice, clean and comfy when it arrived but after ...
customer_reviews.text: The mat looked nice, clean and comfy when it arrived but after a couple of weeks it started to turn gray from the dust (because it's white, it's expected that all dirt will be quickly visible on it) so I put it in a machine and washed it as per the instructions in cold water. When I took it out from the washing machine, it fell apart. If the mat is not supposed to be washed or washed by hand, this should be stated in the instructions. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Genteele Non-Slip Memory Foam Contour Shaggy Bathroom Mat,  Super Plush Bath Mat, Washable
customer_reviews.text: Bath mat got matted on one side of it and all was good until I washed them as directed and they started to shed during the washing and started shedding while being washed on warm water. To not doing well either on cooler air in the dryer to fluff up the shag on the rug. The area that the shag matted down from placing your feet on it never returned to the full shag of the rest of the rug. I believe it was the material they made this rug out of was of unsuitable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Laird

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bath mat. It is cushy and soft on my feet, and the color looks nice. One downside is that the more worn it gets, the more ratty the fibers look. Considering getting a wood bath mat instead to look more elegant (this bath mat is more on the comfy side, so if you're concerned about interior design, this rug won't look like a nice shag rug for long)
customer_reviews.author: ESiews

customer_reviews.title: affordable ultra luxe bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this bath mat! when you step INTO (not onto) it, it feels like you sink down knee deep into a soft cozy cloudlike marshmallow! I've been randomly returning to my bathroom in my bare feet just to stand on it. Nice product. Haven't washed it yet, so we'll see what happens to the rug strands after a trip through the washer. will dry it in the sun. THANKS Genteele!!!
customer_reviews.author: tigwid

customer_reviews.title: broke apart, spilling filler cushion in washer -big mess
customer_reviews.text: used for a period now (less than a year). filling blew out in washer with towels, and have a big mess to clean up. was nice both in function and size before literally falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only or use carpet shampoo device
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rug! We purchased the gray color u-shaped rug for our bathroom. Super soft and plush. I wouldn’t recommend putting this in the washing machine. Most memory foam products don’t do well. If you have a carpet shampooing machine I suggest using the hand held attachment to clean the rug. That’s what I use for our memory foam mattress and it cleans the memory foam very well. Buying the smaller rug now!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Flores

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfy but the way it was packaged wasn’t good. It was folded straight down the middle so I had to keep folding it the opposite way to flatten out.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: waste of money =(
customer_reviews.text: loved the bath mat- it is super soft, fluffy and plush. BUT...i had to wash the mat today (followed all the directions on the tag) and after i took it out of the washer the mat had ripped on an entire side!!! this mat is very cheaply made. i'm so sad that this mat didn't hold up better and i wasted $23. i don't normally write reviews but i hope everyone reads this before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer tan

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy & so soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as described and pictured. Thick and fluffy like walking on the softest cotton. I was worried that they would not wash well and would leave a lot of lint in my dryer, but they came out looking brand new. Very very pleased with these. They are so fat and fluffy they might be too fluffy for some people. If you don’t have a large capacity washer and dryer, I’m not sure they would fit. The first time I washed them they were a little stiff and difficult to get into the washer and dryer. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: snoopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent & soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough bath mat. The only problem we had was when washing, the mat becomes so water logged it throws the washing machine off its axle when it spins it as it is so heavy & sodden with water. We’ve ended up buying a different product as we couldn’t seem to overcome this. Otherwise a nice, soft, absorbent bath mat.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: beige and this mat was a perfect color fit
customer_reviews.text: We recently changed colors in our bathroom decor. We went with blues, grays,white, beige and this mat was a perfect color fit. But the best part is the comfort of the mat. You don't feel like you are hitting the floor when you step out on it. Love it. Will order again- no reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sheipe

customer_reviews.title: So niceeee
customer_reviews.text: Its great and feels soft too. BUT, it is very hard to clean and easy to get stuff tangled in it. Vacuuming it is impossible so it grossed me out what could really be in the middle of all of it. Eventually, I just threw it out and replaced it with a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Update: doesn't hold up to washing
customer_reviews.text: Update: this rug is soft and comfy but it doesn't dry quickly enough and after the second machine wash it's falling apart. I've reduced my review to one star because I've no use for a bath rug that can't be washed. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ashoetee

customer_reviews.title: Nice as a permanent rug, not for shower-only use.
customer_reviews.text: Very thick. Absorbs water well. Feels cushy. I think it would be fine as a permanent rug, but I wanted something absorbent and nonslip but a little thinner, that could be hung over a towel bar after use. Could not find that on Amazon. Ended up with one from Wal*Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Executive and Mom

customer_reviews.title: Rugs are WAY to thick
customer_reviews.text: I blame myself for not inspecting these items closer. From the photos I couldn't tell that these were high pile rugs. I purchased a small bathtub and a contour rug. My bathroom is unfortunately small and tight and the thickness of the contour rug prevents the door from closing. I am debating on returning it or hacking (cutting) it, so that I can have some privacy in the restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Bath Mat Falls apart after washing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mats in June 2018. After approximately 3 weeks, I washed them separately on the gentle cycle in cold water. After taking them out of the washer, I observed that the entire seams were separated. Not happy with the purchases and cannot return. Save your money and skip this product.
customer_reviews.author: mari sue

customer_reviews.title: Such amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a rug with smaller dimensions for our camper. This one is perfect! I’m impressed with the quality & also how well it washes up. (I vacuum it with our dyson as well) Our dog even uses this as a bed! It absorbs all water when getting out of the shower & dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Small but very nice
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you note the size of this mat before ordering because it is small. But the mat itself is wonderful very soft and plush. A great addition to my bathroom. Love sinking my feet into it after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: best bathroom mat I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Similar to my other review for different size, so can say different batches are consistent. So soft, so luxurious, your bathroom will look like a high-end spa. I have had no problem with drying issue others have had, mine dry quickly and have retained their shape and feel for several months of daily use. Best mat I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Felix

customer_reviews.title: A very plush toilet mat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very plush toilet mat. It has plenty of memory foam to squish your toes into along with the short shag rug. I chose the wrong color but I like the mat so much, I'm keeping it anyway! I'm sure I'll be purchasing another for our second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: E. Briones

customer_reviews.title: Softer than the clouds!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the softest thing I have ever laid my feet upon. If you are looking for a bath mat that will exceed your expectations, then this is for you. Imagine stepping out of the shower onto the softest clouds you can possibly dream of. That's exactly what this feels like. I will be buying more of these for my other bathrooms as well. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Thor_King

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: It's a little darker than what I thought, my bad. But it's very thick on your feet. Doesn't slip around. My only real complaint was after maybe 6 washings it started to fall apart. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart.
customer_reviews.text: I washed it once and the top layer came separated from memory foam and is shedding. No dryer used. Happened to both rugs.
customer_reviews.author: YYakusheva

customer_reviews.title: Super Plush bath mats
customer_reviews.text: I just received these yesterday and they are super soft and plush. I stand for a while after I shower to get ready and these bath mats definitely made that more comfortable. I would definitely recommend. If a larger size was in stock, I would have gotten it. I ended up ordering the 17 x 24 which does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats! They are so perfect to step out onto when getting out of the shower. They are nice and thick which offers a nice cushion when standing in the bathroom and getting ready. The only downside is that there is no grip to the bottom and they do slide around a bit. But I am buying another set for the other bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: A2Runner

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old one with the Genteele Non-Slip Memory Foam Shaggy Bathroom Mat, Water Absorbent, Super Plush Bath Mat. Went through the reviews and high marks on softness. Figured I would give it a go. Glad I did, super soft and high quality material. This one is leaps and bounds better than the one I had from home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Bright White and not dingy off white
customer_reviews.text: great bright white color, very comfy and plush as described! overall i'm happy with this purchase. I was a bit hesitant with the mats since they came folded, but they flattened out okay and look/feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User 84

customer_reviews.title: I was in-love with the white rug, BUT it had major issues.
customer_reviews.text: The white rug was great for the 3 months I owned it. After 2-3 washes, the entire seem ripped open. It was extremely hard to keep the white rug clean without using bleach. Over time, it became a little dingy despite having washed it. I really wished it would’ve lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super plush
customer_reviews.text: Very spongy and comfortable underfoot as well as absorbent. The only miss would be if you have a shower door with little floor clearance. This mat will add an inch to your floor. Now if I can just keep the dog from claiming it as his favorite bed!
customer_reviews.author: runcix

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS THE BEST. REALLY SOFT AND FLUFFY, AND LARGE, PREFECT FOR A SMALL BATHROOM , AND THE COLOR TEAL IS PREFECT, DOES NOT SHOW THE DIRT LIKE WHITE AND OTHER LIGHT COLORS. BOUGHT A SECOND ONE. STRONGLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT, YOU WON'T BE SORRY.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Good bath mat
customer_reviews.text: We really like this bath mat. It is cushiony and soft and the color is great. It is good so far. Would reccomend. Also was shipped quickly and decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Howard

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are so comfy in our bathroom, I took a chance getting white, but they wash well and are still fairly white after having them for a few months. I'm sure if I washed them with a little bleach I could get them back to perfect white.
customer_reviews.author: yoda

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality product. Looks good but not practical. Only after one wash the thing separated, looks like it was put together by glue or netting material completely falls apart after only one wash. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Best shopper

customer_reviews.title: this would look great and feel great
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely plush, and stands out in the bathroom. I wish I could’ve kept it, but my small bathroom didn’t work for this rug because it did not fit under my door and stood out too much to bring all the attention to the rug. In a bigger bathroom, this would look great and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable rug I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these rugs for our bathroom (one put in front of the shower and the other in front of the sink) and I will start with they are extremely comfortable! They’re extremely comfortable on your feet and they look great in our small bathroom. The only [small] negative I will say is they are a little thicker than I expected. Not sure if I didn’t see that dimension posted or not, but you can trip on them if you’re not careful. So just keep that in mind. But other than that small factor, they are absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn O

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the plush feel. I washed them and was concerned that one cannot use bleach as mine are white... I washed them on gentle /cold setting and they came out beautifully! No excess fluff in the washer or dryer! I'm getting some more for a friend who fell in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Jeff Van Jahnke

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SOFT&VERY ABSORBENT
customer_reviews.text: Loveee these rugs! Only downside is, the rug that goes around the toilet is to thick for my bathroom door to open and close:( so I'm not able to use that rug until I move into our new house. But the bath rug, that I step on to get out of the shower, is AMAZING. Would definitely recommend these rugs!:)
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap this thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap this thing is amazing. My dog laid on it and would not get up. He hates the bath and laid next to it so he could be on the mat again. It was too thick to open the door over, but if they could go ahead and make couches and flooring out if this... that'd be great.
customer_reviews.author: Invictus

customer_reviews.title: Best Bathroom Rug Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a mission to find a nice quality shaggy bathroom rug that is not chenille. And I found one. I knew I would want them in both bathrooms based on previous reviews. And I am not disappointed. The teal is very bright and pretty. The gray is very pretty, as well. But what I like most is the texture. It truly is like walking on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: garbage, slides around and falls apart after first gentle wash
customer_reviews.text: Does not stick to floor and fell apart on first wash with tiny amount of gentle soap. It was on gentle cycle. I'd like to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey R.

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous and SO soft! I ordered the large one first and it was too big for a small bathroom. So I ordered two small ones (one for in front of the tub and the other for in front of the sink) and they were a perfect fit. I'm not sure how they will hold up because I just received them but based on the quality and softness I'm giving it a 5-star rating. BUT, note the large ones are really big.
customer_reviews.author: Iisha

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Too small! I suppose it's perfect for a very small bathroom, but mine is not. Can barely fit one foot on it so I'm sending it back otherwise, very soft and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah

customer_reviews.title: So thick and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath mat!! It is so white and clean looking!! It is incredibly soft and I am so pleased with the memory foam built in. It is perfect for kneeling while bathing my baby. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea how to safely clean this mat.
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat felt amazing!!!! Then, I washed it. Warm water, low heat dry, and it completely fell apart. Still super soft mat, but the shaggy rug now looks like a shaggy toupee.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Cisna

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set in yesterday and I am in love. The memory foam is soooooo comfortable. And the water resistance is perfect as I have a 9 year old. They fit perfect in my bathroom and are cozy and wonderful. ... 3rd day and my entire family is in love with these mats. My husband said it feels like we splurged to luxury. So happy with this purchase, and it's made in America. Cant go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too thick
customer_reviews.text: I must say the rug is nice. But, it is almost a full inch thick. I trip over it more than I place my feet on it.
customer_reviews.author: Txmmoore

customer_reviews.title: Soft!!! Step into Soft cushy  luxury!!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry can't leave info on easy clean or durability. I just received this rug. Love the soft texture an soft sink into softness comfort of this rug!!! Will wait an see about the rest!☺
customer_reviews.author: skippy521

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feels good too
customer_reviews.text: Just a great simple mat.. I love this shade of grey. It would look good in any bathroom and is a great size for smaller spaces. We are are using them in our cabin which has tiny bathrooms. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: mama & mini thumbs up

customer_reviews.title: Lush, soft and machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Lush, soft and a treat for my feet. Also, stays white and cleans up well in washing machine. Great quality I just wish they came in larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Parent

customer_reviews.title: Soft/ fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. I ordered white (not easy to keep clean) but definitely soft and fuzzy.. things easily stick to it and I’m not sure how to wash it
customer_reviews.author: Maria sederes

customer_reviews.title: My husband lved these
customer_reviews.text: He is so picky and after three diffeernt kinds of rugs he finally is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda gerchick

customer_reviews.title: Not durable in the washer
customer_reviews.text: This rug is the most comfortable and softest bath mat I have ever had. When I washed it... It completely ripped apart & now I am having to throw it away. If you never wash your bath mats and want something soft for your feet after the shower this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Selph

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft! The only downfall is that there are little pieces coming off of it and it's going all over the house. It's very soft, and I wonder how long it will really last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it. Comfy, looks cute in my bathroom, try to order another one, but they have nothing left in stock. Will keep checking. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: small rug for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love it - fits perfectly - high quality - since I like white in the bathroom - I am going to order a second one for the future - always hard to find exactly what I want...
customer_reviews.author: p.d.

customer_reviews.title: Iris like standing on marshmallows!
customer_reviews.text: I use it by my bathroom sink and as I get dressed I am standing on a soft pad that does not shift. Great customer service. I highly recommend this rug. It has real memory foam not like many rugs that claim to be soft.
customer_reviews.author: gosobe

customer_reviews.title: Soft soft soft and secure grip underneath
customer_reviews.text: Yes exactly what I was looking for . Haven’t washed it so I don’t know 🤷‍♀️ how it will hold up but love it !
customer_reviews.author: New york

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bath mat! Great cushion for my knees when bathing my toddler! Very soft and size is perfect for our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Not machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Loved getting out of tub and stepping on this cushioning soft rug best feeling ever. Then I had to wash it. The tag said it was machine washable. It fell apart in washer so sad only had a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Norine Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff. It feels like it has cardboard backing. Looks cheap. Not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sikica Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Just throw them in the washer and dryer and they come out like new. This is very soft and plush and the color has not faded after several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo Risin

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds, foam and plush
customer_reviews.text: Softest bath mat ever. Best of both worlds, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Not stable
customer_reviews.text: Too thick and not stable for someone with a disabilty. It’s like standing on a 1 inch thick pad.
customer_reviews.author: PapaBEar

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted until we washed it. It completely fell apart in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Close

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: nice on your feet when you get out of the shower, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Neal A.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great but hard to clean. But they're perfect when it comes to softness. It's perfect. So soft n comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa f

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are a very nice thick material. Very soft and squishy. They are a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great rug, kinda small though
customer_reviews.text: Very soft rug! I love stepping on this when I get out of the shower and stand at the sink! Gave it 4 stars because I just wish it was a lil bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Best mats ever!
customer_reviews.text: They are super plush, and feel amazing on the feet. I bought one for in front of the shower, and one for in front of the toilet. Two different mats for in front of my sinks which I am returning and bought these instead because for the price, and comfort of these rugs you just can’t go wrong. Seriously love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel when I step onto it
customer_reviews.text: This shaggy bathroom mat is a real hit! So plush and cozy. Love the feel when I step onto it. I highly recommend this product for yourself or as a gift to someone. They'll thank you forever!
customer_reviews.author: mendy hoffman

customer_reviews.title: SO Soft and Plush!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awesome!!! Oh my gosh, it is SO soft and plush, the color is perfect (light grey) and the size is just right. I’ve paid the same amount for a mediocre, run of the mill, rug at target or Kohl’s...never again!!!
customer_reviews.author: ASwan

customer_reviews.title: A little piece of heaven
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat is like stepping on a heavenly cloud. It warms my soul and is everything I could've hoped for. Only downside is apparently it doesn't hold up well to puppy chewing. Sigh. Avoidable for most, but if you have a dog that chews, they'll get through it pretty quickly. He didn't do enough damage for it to be tossed, just not sure how it will hold up in washing now with a hole in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Fitting

customer_reviews.title: This is so soft and soaks up the water on your feet fast.
customer_reviews.text: I have not washed mine yet and don't feel it will need to be laundered for quite some time. But I feel it will launder very well.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: As a bath mat, this product is like standing on a firm pillow. I have yet to determine how durable or easy to clean it will be, but it is attractive and comfortable as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Janis D.

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: So soft!!! Stepping on this mat is a dream. It is a little small, but since I love the black and white tile in my bathroom I wanted as much of that to show while being able to walk out of the shower without dying. Only downfall is because it is so white, it does get dirty relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I am not being dramatic
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bath mats I have ever owned. I initially only ordered one set but loved them so much that I ordered another set
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart when washed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bath mat until I washed it on gentle with cold water and it fell apart!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Mount

customer_reviews.title: Warm on a cold morning.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the product long enough to know if it cleans easily, but I purchased it for looks and comfort ~ it provides both. A little thicker than most rugs, but we're used to that now and it does hug the floor beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: SASSY ONE!

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Plush, Soft, and Looks Nice as Well
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice and plush just as it appears. Very soft. Looks nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: TheJourney

customer_reviews.title: IT' SO FLUFFY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Plush, soft, and comfortable. Exactly what I was looking for! It's so fluffy and luxurious! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mjcarolina

customer_reviews.title: Best Bath Mat Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bath mat for my boyfriend as a present and he thinks it is the best gift ever. I then, obviously, had to buy one for myself and he now keeps trying to steal it because he wants another one. Keeps your toes nice and warm when the bathroom floor is frigid on a cold day. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Soft standard rug
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rug for stepping out of the shower onto it. So far so good. Feels nice on the toes. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bath mat. I did wash it on delicate and everything was ok. I will however say it took forever to dry. I had to put it in the dryer 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Manning

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort for the legs/back!
customer_reviews.text: It is incredibly soft to stand on and even though I bought it for the bathroom but am thinking of ordering one for where I stand in the kitchen as it seems to reduce pressure on the legs and back! Wonderful quality and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful color - and quality product. It will look amazing in my new remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: TGA FAN!

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This mat is so soft, strong, thick, and extremely comfortable. It's rubber backing also is great and keeps it in place. I will be replacing all my other bath mats with this.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for a week
customer_reviews.text: I loved the rug till first washing when it fell apart. It looks great, feels awesome but don’t try to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat in FL

customer_reviews.title: Plush rug
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit stiff at first, but washes up easy. Super soft & plush in the feet!
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft with a good amount of cushion. When I wash it though it messes up my washing machine cause it soaks up and holds all the water. I ring it out and hang it to dry and it takes several days. Besides that it’s holding up nicely and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Luscious
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rug for the price. It doesn’t slide around and is very thick and bouncy. I haven’t tried washing it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Rugs aren’t the best quality but are ok. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: When I got these I was happy with the softness however my door didn’t easily close over them. I had to force them closed. After I washed once the quality went down quickly. They didn’t fall apart but they lost the softness and I wasn’t happy with that so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Kershner

customer_reviews.title: FELL APART AT FIRST WASHING
customer_reviews.text: I liked this mat for the time that I had it. However, the first time I put it in the washing machine it completely fell apart. This was a complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Very thick!!
customer_reviews.text: The mat is soft and very thick! Too thick for me just because of the small spacing in my bathroom. And then the color didn’t go quite right. However it works well in my bedroom and is nice to step onto out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Ulland

product_meta.title: Genteele Non-Slip Memory Foam Shaggy Bathroom Mat, Water Absorbent, Super Plush Bath Mat, Washable Bathroom Rug (21" X 34", Gray)
feature_bullets: COMFORTABLE AND LUXURIOUS - Bath mat is filled with super soft and comfortable polyurethane memory foam and outer material is ultra luxurious and cozy, cloudy, shaggy microfiber. Step right out of the bath or shower onto a cloud! Great for bathroom, vanity, vacation home, master bathroom, kids bathroom, guest suite. Great gift idea for all occasions, Christmas, Wedding, Fathers Day, Mothers Day, Valentines.

MACHINE WASHABLE - Machine wash in cold water with mild detergent. Do not use chlorine or bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or lay to air dry. Color will not fade. Color will stay nice and vibrant for years to come!
NON SLIP - Mat is backed with PVC dots to prevent shifting and skidding. For best non-slip performance, do not place mat on wet surface.

MAXIMUM ABSORBENCY - Super plush and thick shaggy surface will have the ability to absorb a good amount of water so each of your household members may shower the same day and still get to use a dry bathroom rug!

GUARANTEE - Love it or your money back! Life time warranty by Genteele. If you are not satisfied with your rug or if you decide that this is not for you, then please do not hesitate and reach out to us through Amazon at any time for either a refund or replacement.
